creator: ask@ag-trek.de
text:
The exact same setup worked fine in Apache 1.3.27:

When trying to use mod_jk (tried dynamic and static module) the apache child
throws a segfault. When mod_ssl (mod_ssl-2.8.16-1.3.29) is taken out, it works.
mod_jk Version 1.2.0, 1.2.5 and latest cvs snapshot.


Here is a trace with gdb and a strace (strace show the segfault right after
the attempt to load some certs)

(gdb) run
Starting program: /data/src/apache_1.3.29/src/httpd
[New Thread 1024 (LWP 29498)]

Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
[Switching to Thread 1024 (LWP 29498)]
0x4041a289 in jk_mount_context (cmd=0xbfffb2dc, dummy=0x0,
    context=0x81b11a4 "/*.jsp", worker=0x81b11ac "ajp13", maybe_cookie=0x0)
    at mod_jk.c:692
692         map_put(conf->uri_to_context, context, worker, (void **)&old);


Here is the strace output.
